src.features package¶

Submodules¶

src.features.feature_engineering module¶

class src.features.feature_engineering.FeatureEngineering(model='tf_idf', analizer='word', n_gram=(1, 1))¶

Bases: object

This class applies text feature engineering operations: tf-idf, cv or word2vec

fit(corpus)¶
fit_transform(corpus)¶
get_frequency_based_model()¶
transform(corpus)¶

src.features.preprocess module¶

src.features.preprocess.apply_lemmatizer(sentence: str) → str¶

This method applies lemma to given sentence

Parameters

sentence – sentence to apply lemma operation, :type str

Returns

src.features.preprocess.apply_operation(corpus, operation, **kwargs)¶

This method applies one operation and returns the result

Parameters

  • corpus – list of sentences, :type list

  • operation – image operation

  • kwargs – (optional) params to apply operations, for stemmer stemmer operation and for remove stopwords stopwords list

:return operation applied result

src.features.preprocess.apply_preprocess_operations_to_corpus(corpus: list, operations: list, **kwargs) → list¶

This method applies list of operations to given corpus

Parameters

  • corpus – list of sentences, :type list

  • operations –

    list of operations, :type list operations:

    • remove_less_than_two

    • apply_lemmatizer

    • apply_stemmer

    • remove_stopwords

    • replace_special_chars

    • remove_whitespace

    • remove_punctuation

    • remove_number

    • to_lower

    • remove_hyperlink

:param kwargs:(optional) params to apply operations,

for stemmer stemmer operation and for remove stopwords stopwords list

Returns

preprocessed sentences, :type list

src.features.preprocess.apply_stemmer(sentence: str, stemmer_name=<PorterStemmer>) → str¶

This method applies stemmer to given sentence

Parameters

  • sentence – input string, :type str

  • stemmer_name – stemmer to apply: SnowballStemmer | PorterStemmer

Returns

src.features.preprocess.basic_preprocess_operations(sentence: str) → str¶
This method applies basic preprocess operations to given sentence:

remove_hyperlink & replace_newline & to_lower & remove_number & remove_punctuation & remove_whitespace

Parameters

sentence – sentence to apply preprocess operation, :type str

Returns
